name: Pong GBA
description:
Just a pong for the gba,

this is my first game ever made for GBA console so it may not seem too much but it's my first step into the GBA development.

I did it with the help of the butano engine from github.

I recommend the use of mGBA emulator.

CONTROLS:

move: d-pad up/down

a button hold: speed up
